summary: This is a forwarded email from March 2017, originally sent by an individual to Brad Edwards, discussing a strategy to encourage a female contact to meet for a 'risk-free chat' by assuring her she can trust the sender. The email suggests the contact has 'nothing to lose and potentially a lot to gain.'

persons.name: Brad Edwards
persons.context: Appears as the recipient of an email discussing a strategy to encourage a female contact to meet for a conversation, described as 'risk-free'.

persons.name: Pottinger Stan
persons.context: Listed as a recipient on the forwarded email chain alongside Brad Edwards.

persons.name: Coulthard
persons.context: Appears as the original sender of the email to Brad Edwards, proposing a coordinated effort to encourage a female contact to meet.

connections.description: Coulthard sends an email to Brad Edwards proposing a coordinated communication strategy regarding a female contact.
Both are listed as recipients on the same forwarded email chain.

events.title: Email proposing coordinated contact
events.description: Coulthard emails Brad Edwards, stating they have invited a female contact to a 'risk-free chat' and suggesting Edwards send an email to encourage her to meet and assure her she can trust Coulthard.

keyFacts: An email from March 2017 discusses a strategy to encourage a female contact to meet for a 'risk-free chat.'
The sender, Coulthard, asks Brad Edwards to send a follow-up email to the contact to assure her she can trust Coulthard.
The communication frames the proposed meeting as having no downside ('nothing to lose') and potential gain for the contact.
